entry.string: The Wizards module is a handy way of making advanced, specific Xaraya functionality available to your users and admins. Wizards are a collection of simple "one-click" scripts, each of which performs a specific task.
Wizards let you take advantage of the entire Xaraya API and put that functionality at the disposal of your users in a flexible way you define and control.
Wixards are extensible. The module comes with a number of predefined wizards, but you can easily create more.
You can configure wizards to be available to your admins, users, or both.
First, use the Modify Config menu option on the Wizards admin menu to define whether wizards will be available to users, admins or both.

The module comes with a predefined RunScripts privilege that allows access to the wizards. Assign this privilege to whatever user group that you want to give access to. (Note: Admins automatically have access to wizards if they are enabled.)

The wizard scripts that appear on the user and admin menus of the module are located in /modules/wizards/xarwizards/admin and /modules/wizards/xarwizards/user respectively. Removing a script from its directory will remove it from the menu.
By using the existing scripts as templates, you can create new wizards with your own chosen functionality and add them to either menu. A simple Example wizard script is included for this purpose.
